name: Bolton Valley Resort
description: Only a 30-minute drive from downtown Burlington and Lake Champlain, Bolton Valley sits high in the Green Mountains of Vermont. It boasts the highest base elevation of any ski area in the state. It is a unique, high-mountain alpine village surrounded by over 5,000 pristine acres. At Bolton Valley, the recreational opportunities are as numerous as the views are spectacular. Whether your interest is skiing or snowboarding, telemark or Nordic, backcountry or night skiing – or just a relaxing snowshoe in the woods, Bolton Valley has something for everyone in the family. Bolton Valley also has a hotel, Sports center, bar and restaurants.
